name: Node-RED+
description: Node-RED is a programming tool for wiring together hardware devices, APIs and online services in new and interesting ways. It provides a browser-based editor that makes it easy to wire together flows using the wide range of nodes in the palette that can be deployed to its runtime in a single-click.
author: node-red

form_fields.label: TZ ▶ Container OS Timezone
form_fields.hint: Affects date, logs, scheduler nodes (default: Europe/Prague)

form_fields.label: Node-RED Credential Secret
form_fields.hint: Used to encrypt stored credentials. If not set, a random key is generated at startup.

form_fields.label: Node-RED Admin Username
form_fields.hint: If you set this (along with PASSWORD_HASH), the editor/API will be locked behind basic auth. Otherwise it’s open.

form_fields.label: Node-RED Admin Password Hash
form_fields.hint: Bcrypt hash of the admin password. _You can also set these via env vars (NODE_RED_ADMIN_USER / NODE_RED_ADMIN_PASSWORD_HASH), but if you leave it commented out, anyone can open the editor and deploy flows._
